mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LAW_EXERCISE_PAPER ( id, CONFIGURE_ID, USER_ID, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{configureId}, #{userId}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ID AS "id", a.QUESTION_CONTENT AS "questionContent", a.QUESTION_ID AS "questionId" FROM LAW_PAPER_PAPER p LEFT JOIN LAW_ANSWER a ON p.QUEST_ID = a.QUESTION_ID WHERE p.CONFIGURE_ID = #{configureId} ORDER BY a.QUESTION_ID, a.ORDERSORT
